name: Imperiets Arvingar: The calm before the storm
name_original: Imperiets Arvingar: The calm before the storm
description:
This game was made for a portfolio project piece.

We were two people making this game;

Emil Ramsell 

Wes Ekman 

Our school FUTURE GAMES, got the rights to use the IMPERIETS ARVINGAR book series to create this game.
